item.title: The cost of O’Neil habitation
item.dc:creator: Yuxi Liu
item.description: To win (?) a twitter argument, we calculated the energetic cost of O’Neil habitat per person. Oddly, it is just affordable by modern standards, ~0.72 million USD per person. Let it be known that the SF housing crisis is cheaper to solve by building O’Neil cylinders.

item.title: Whalefall
item.dc:creator: Yuxi Liu
item.description: Thoughts on the recent ‘DeepSeek shock’ of the stock market. The market is being even less efficient than usual, and much of the ‘professional’ commentators are idiots or bullshitters. I wrote this post to prevent my Gell-Mann amnesia.
